definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Non-mormality is a very popular problem in time series data.
sentences.chinese: 在处理时间序列数据时，很关注正态分布吗？

sentences.english: Diameter distribution of tree stratum reveals truncated normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 乔木层株数随胸径分布呈现截尾正态分布。

sentences.english: A lognormal distribution model was used to fit the mite species abundance.
sentences.chinese: 革螨种多度分布用对数正态分布模型拟合。

sentences.english: Method of Non-parameter was used to analyze variances in skewness distribution.
sentences.chinese: 非参法用于分析资料成非正态分布的变量。

sentences.english: The results showed that Al-humic floc size followed a lognormal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，腐植酸絮体的粒径呈现对数正态分布。

sentences.english: The number distribution of diameter grade obeys normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 雷竹株数按径阶分布服从正态分布。

sentences.english: There are some important corollaries of having two overlapping normal distributions.
sentences.chinese: 通过两条重合的正态分布曲线可得出重要结论。

sentences.english: The LOGNORMDIST() function returns the cumulative lognormal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 函数返回累积对数正态分布。

sentences.english: The probability distribution for displacement response under the excitation force actions of multi-looms obeys normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 在多台布机扰力下的反应的概率分布服从正态分布。

sentences.english: However, the act-weight distribution may take a normal form.
sentences.chinese: 然而，项目权分布则是一个正态分布。

sentences.english: Results BHR of youths in military service didn't coincided with normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 结果青年军人BHR的分布不符合正态分布规律。

sentences.english: Combines to make or become the obvious normal distribution curve.
sentences.chinese: 并成明显的正态分布曲线。

sentences.english: These are two Gaussian or normal distributions; bell curves.
sentences.chinese: 这是两条高斯图或者说是正态分布图的钟形曲线。

sentences.english: The above example uses a normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 上面的例子使用了正态分布。

sentences.english: A normal distribution is the classic bell curve that appears so frequently in statistics.
sentences.chinese: 正态分布是典型的钟形曲线，这在统计学中经常出现。

sentences.english: The distribution of I and k value contented a normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 孔平均生长速度与孔半径的分布满足正态分布。

pinyin: zui4 da4 si4 ran2 gu1 ji4

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
